title: tuyarEdum
sahitya:
tuyarEdum toDarAda tuNai peTruyya nI vayalUr vaDivElanai vaNangiDuvAi manamE


anupallavi

  viyappuravE undan vinai yAvum panipOl vilagi ODiDumE malai pOlavE vandiDinum


caraNam    mEdini mIdinil unnai shUdu shUzhum pOdum shOdanaiyil vIzhum pOdum vEdanaiyil nI Azhum pOdum
vEda mantra svarUpananta nAthan pAda kamalam paTri Adarikkak-kOrinAl allalallAm tIrumE
